# certificateType

**Instance Property**

The type of the certificate in the identity configured in `identityReference` or `identityData`.

## Declaration

```swift
var certificateType: NEVPNIKEv2CertificateType { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEVPNIKEv2CertificateType/RSA].

## Accessing certificate properties

- **serverCertificateIssuerCommonName**: A string containing the value of the Subject Common Name field of the Certificate Authority certificate that issued the IKEv2 server’s certificate.
- **serverCertificateCommonName**: A string containing the value of the Subject Common Name field of the IKEv2 server’s certificate.
- **NEVPNIKEv2CertificateType**: An enumeration of certificate type values.

items.description: A string containing the value of the Subject Common Name field of the Certificate Authority certificate that issued the IKEv2 server’s certificate.
items.name: serverCertificateIssuerCommonName

items.description: A string containing the value of the Subject Common Name field of the IKEv2 server’s certificate.
